entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as having a death mask-like face, marble white and still. He is also referred to as 'My Lord' by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as sitting on the brink of victory, wondering why the Elder Wand refuses to perform as it should.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is referred to as a legendary object that should perform for its rightful owner.

relationships.description: Voldemort has a problem with the Elder Wand, wondering why it refuses to perform as it should.
Snape is subject to Voldemort's authority, referred to as 'My Lord'.
